name: userstyles.org - Rating Stars for all pages
description:
Yet another "new rating system (stars)"
 
Original Style: "userstyles.org: new rating system (stars)" by mod_wastrel
http://userstyles.org/styles/20994
 
To avoid frequent merge between the original and my modification, I branched yet another version, though there are few deferences so far...
 
********** Changes from the original **********
 - Support more userstyles.org pages
 
<===== Change Log =====>
Jan 30, 2010: Now, works in each page like "Average rating:" in this page(thanks zebus).
Oct 12, 2009: Added CDN domain of NYU(.nyud.net)
Oct  8, 2009: Added "margin-left:10px !important;"
